bike.description: Specialized M4SL single speed specific aluminum frame, with eccentric BB and 29" wheel geos, fully butted, disc only, integrated head tube, asym seat stay, forged drop outs and reinforced disc mount

components.description: Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy type full cartridge bearings
Specialized Rockhopper XC, Body Geometry, 143mm width, front and rear bumpers
Alloy two bolt, 12.5mm offset, micro adjust, 30.9mm
